name: LG GL-Q292SHAM Frost-free Double-door Refrigerator (260 Ltrs, 3 Star Rating, Hazel Aster)
description:
Installation: For requesting an installation/demo for this product once delivered, please call LG support directly on 1800-315-9999 and provide the products model name. Installation charges may be levied by LG. Customers are requested to confirm directly with LG while requesting for a demo/installation.
							
						
					
						 
							Frost-free double-door refrigerator; 260 litres capacity
							
						
					
						 
							Energy Rating: 3 Star
